objectives.about: The Internal Quality Assurance Cell (IQAC) was established in 2004 as per the guidelines of the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC). The IQAC is responsible for developing, implementing, and continuously improving the quality systems within the institution.
objectives: To develop a system for conscious, consistent and catalytic action to improve the academic and administrative performance of the institution.
To promote measures for institutional functioning towards quality enhancement through internalization of quality culture and institutionalization of best practices.
To provide a sound basis for decision-making to improve institutional functioning.
To act as a dynamic system for quality changes in higher education.
